name: Among Monsters(Game Jam)
description:
This was a 5 day game jam project for a competition for my university where I was a programmer working along side another programmer and 3 artists. 

Survive as long as possible. Kill and steal monsters' skins and change into them using the blue phone boxes. Avoid police at all costs!

Input: Right Click to move, Left Click to interact.

PROGRAMMERS:

Jake @Snarkbash 

 Wei @Jackasss

ARTISTS:

2D - Briar @Artangel.B, Ravi @REN_Art

3D - Jeffrey @阿凡達
